rebl 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference
    • Using the Package

Project: REBL

Project Description

Analyze survey data using Rasch model.

Code Conventions

  • renv to manage dependencies
  • Tidy style
  • Lower snake case for naming functions and objects
  • Using code coverage to assess testing
  • Functions should include assertthat::test_that() calls in the beginning to ensure user is providing appropriate inputs
  • Functions should include @seealso documentation linking to related functions

Project Structure

  • table_of_contents.R - Main script that runs all others. Allows user to navigate project
  • /1_raw - Raw data files
  • /2_clean - Clean data files
  • /3_functions - Functions from project. To be converted into proper R package functions
  • /4_scripts - Scripts from project in development of REBL items and scores.
  • /5_objects - Intermediate objects used in data analysis
  • /6_outputs - Tabular outputs for paper
  • /7_plots - Figures for paper

Package Structure

  • /R - Functions
  • /data - Datasets associated with package for example use and testing
  • /man - Documentation
  • /test - Testing suite
  • /revamp - Temporary folder for the rework. Not committed to git
